Reviews.Title: Great if your a gamer
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a christmas gift to myself and because I like video games plus using my cell phone so I thought it would be a good combination. Here's a break down of my experience.Good things:1. Is a cell phone and psp combined.2. Is 4G so the internet is fast3. Sony's Android Skin is pretty good4. Has a strong speaker5. Battery life is pretty decent6. Strong antenna7. Good price point. Honestly for $200 unlocked this phone is not a bad deal for what you get.Not so good things:1. Cheap materials. Sony really went on the cheap when selecting materials for this phone.2. The screen scratches very easily. A testament to point 1. I've had the phone less than a month and already the screen has two large noticable scratches on the screen just from being in my pocket.3. Odd button placement. For example the 'back' button is on the far left unlock most android phones which has it on the right. Plus the buttons don't light up. Not too big of a deal but I expected something a bit more premium from Sony4. Games are expensive if you buy them from Sony. Better if you use an emulator and get them cheap or even free.5. Not all headphones work with the phone. You have to make sure to use headphones without their own volume control otherwise you'll get an 'accessory not supported' message.6. Doesn't accept 2G signal. Not a big deal if you're in the US but I live in Mexico and we don't have 3/4G everywhere. So when I went to visit a buddy of mine in a pueblo (small town) I had to use my old mexican cell phone.Conclusion: Not a bad phone for the price especially if you're into gaming. But I'd think twice before buying it again.

Reviews.Title: Perfect phone!!!
Reviews.Author: A. BARUAH
Reviews.Content: I got this phone after lot of research. I did not want to get into any contract and this phone was the apt one for me. It is at the same league as the iphone.Things I like about the phone:1. Looks2. Touch screen response - very smooth.3. Display of the screen- one of the best.4. Camera 8 MP & HD video - Love it.5. Connect your phone to your PC & Sony updates your phone to the latest Android version.6. Android appsShortcomings:1. You will get a heart attack while opening the phone to insert battery. The back cover is a plastic cover and for a novoice, you will get a feeling if you are doing some mistake and will end up damaging your new phone.2. Battery life was never forte of Sony phones. With no data plan and occasional wi fi connections, the phone some how lasts for one day. Mind it is on a new battery,it will get degraded.3. Camera quality inside the house with the lights on is grainy and yellowish. You will have to explicitly turn off the flash. You cannot zoom the camera in 8 MP mode. If you are into taking photo zooming into photos, you will have to switch for lower resolution.Over all - Buy it, you wont regret.
